sentences.en: A cloud of volcanic ash is spreading across wide areas of the Philippines.
sentences.cn: 火山灰云层正在菲律宾大范围扩散。

sentences.en: After the wheat crop has been gathered, many farmers burn the remains and plough the ash into the soil , so as to enrich the soil.
sentences.cn: 割完小麦后, 许多农夫把麦秸烧掉,并把灰烬埋入土中, 以增加土壤肥力.

sentences.en: Coke is an economical fuel but it leaves a lot of ash.
sentences.cn: 焦炭是一种很经济的燃料,可是燃烧后剩下很多灰.

sentences.en: He brushed the cigarette ash from his sleeve.
sentences.cn: 他掸掉了袖子上的烟灰。

sentences.en: He flicked ash into the ashtray.
sentences.cn: 他把烟灰弹到烟灰缸里.

sentences.en: He flipped the ash off his cigarette.
sentences.cn: 他轻轻弹掉了香烟上的烟灰.

sentences.en: His ashes were scattered at sea.
Knock the ash out of your pipe before you refill it.
sentences.cn: 把烟灰磕出来再装烟丝.

sentences.en: Mount Unzen has been spewing out volcanic ash, gas, and rock today.
sentences.cn: 云仙山今天一直在向外喷涌火山灰、气体和火山岩。

sentences.en: She let the long cone of ash hang at the end of her cigarette.
sentences.cn: 她让长长的烟灰留在烟头上。

sentences.en: The bodies buried in the fine ash slowly decayed.
sentences.cn: 埋在灰烬里的尸体慢慢地腐烂了。

sentences.en: The parks and squares looked grim under a mantle of soot and ash.
sentences.cn: 在一层烟尘的笼罩之下，公园和广场显得阴沉沉的。

sentences.en: The power-generation plant belched out five tonnes of ash an hour.
sentences.cn: 发电站每小时排出5吨灰。

sentences.en: The rafters are made from ash.
The volcano threw new showers of magma and ash into the air.
sentences.cn: 火山又向空中喷出了岩浆和火山灰。

sentences.en: This material is variously termed ash, clinker, cinders or slag.
sentences.cn: 这种材料有不同的名称,如灰 、 炉渣 、 煤渣或矿渣.

words.tran_cn: 像灰的；灰色的；覆盖着灰的

phrases.tran_cn: [基督教]圣灰星期三（复活节前的第七个星期三）
从毁灭中再生；欲火重生

phrases.phrase: turn to ashes in one's mouth
phrases.tran_cn: (变成）极为令人失望(或无价值）的东西
木灰（含有氢氧化钾，具有漂白作用）

trans.tran_en: the soft grey powder that remains after something has been burned
